snippet: The hedge fund giant will be constructing a state-of-the-art headquarters along the waterfront of Stamford, Conn., as part of an economic and community development initiative.
abstract: The hedge fund giant will be constructing a state-of-the-art headquarters along the waterfront of Stamford, Conn., as part of an economic and community development initiative.

headline.main: Bridgewater to Spend $750 Million on New Offices
